author: Theo Francis
title: The 10 Highest-Paid Software and Services CEOs
text:
The highest-paid software executive of 2017? That was Gary Norcross, chief executive of Fidelity National Information Services Inc., at $29.1 million.
Fidelity National, also known as FIS, is a bank-technology provider. Mr. Norcross has led the Jacksonville, Fla.-based company since January 2015. His total compensation increased 46% from $20 million the previous year, according to regulatory filings. The companyâ€™s total shareholder return, which reflects share-price appreciation and dividends, was 26% last year.
